text: There was a man who had a chicken that laid a golden egg every day. Thinking that he would find a large lump of gold in the chicken's intestines, he killed it. But when he opened it, he found that it was like the other chickens. So, impatient to get once a great deal of wealth, he deprived himself of the abundant fruit that the hen was giving him. It is good to be content with what you have and to flee from insatiable greed.
title: La gallina de los huevos de oro
author: nan Esopo
